attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: now the local elections have taken place it's obvious the country have lost faith in the current government. If Labour do believe they are the party to get us through these difficult times they will be elected, if not another party will have the country behind them to lead us out of these troubled times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
